sentences.en: Challenge technology mountain peak, Leading Special Refrigeration air conditioning Technology!
sentences.cn: 挑战技术巅峰, 引领特种制冷空调技术!

sentences.en: Commercial refrigeration relies on fans to circulate the air within the cabinet.
sentences.cn: 商用冷藏柜依靠风扇使空气在柜内流通.

sentences.en: Dear friends, thank you for choosing the Company's Refrigeration Compressed Air Drier.
sentences.cn: 朋友, 感谢你选用了本公司生产的冷冻式压缩空气干燥机.

sentences.en: Every greenhouse operation can use refrigeration facilities'in many ways.
sentences.cn: 从事温室生产时,制冷设备用途很广.

sentences.en: Involve in field refrigeration system mechanical and electrical diagnosis and troubleshooting.
sentences.cn: 负责制冷系统机械和电气的调查分析和疑难排解.

sentences.en: It adopts Freon to refrigeration. It is safe and reliable.
sentences.cn: 采用氟里昂制冷, 安全可靠,温度自动控制,冷冻效率高.

sentences.en: It operates on the same thermodynamic principles as refrigeration.
sentences.cn: 它如同冷冻一样在相同的热力学原理下运转.

sentences.en: Keep all meat products under refrigeration.
sentences.cn: 把所有的肉制品都冷藏起来。
把容易变质的食物冷藏起来.

sentences.en: Mold can grow even under refrigeration, and aging cheese is a good example of that.
sentences.cn: 霉菌在冷藏条件下也可以生长，正在成熟的奶酪就是一个很好的例子。

sentences.en: Most birds can be consumed by a family at one meal, so there is less need for refrigeration.
sentences.cn: 大多数禽类能够由一家人在一餐内食用完，所以对冷藏的需求也偏低。

sentences.en: Refrigeration equipment and laundry equipment will experience modest gains.
sentences.cn: 冷藏和洗韑设备适度盈利也不在话下.

sentences.en: Refrigeration system is a typical multi - input multi - output ( MIMO ) system with strong cross - coupling.
sentences.cn: 制冷系统是典型的参数耦合性强的多输入多输出 复杂系统.

sentences.en: The decay of the meat could have been prevented by proper refrigeration.
sentences.cn: 如果经过适当的冷藏,这些肉本来不至于腐烂掉.

sentences.en: The refrigeration was helpful in the stability of acid value.
sentences.cn: 冷藏有利于保持酸价稳定性.

sentences.en: The temperature differences between ingoing and outgoing streams of gases are higher , thus requiring more refrigeration.
sentences.cn: 进出气流间的温差比较大, 因而需要较多的冷冻量.

sentences.en: This result is of great importance in steam engineering and in refrigeration.
sentences.cn: 这个结果在蒸汽工程和致冷学中很重要.

words.tran_cn: 冷藏（refrigerate的过去分词）；使冷却
冷藏，冷冻；使冷却；使清凉

phrases.tran_cn: 冷凝装置；冷藏设备；冷冻厂
